title: Drawing, "Decorative Design for Ceiling", ca. 1813
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed on recto: tuscia vestale; sacrificio a Giove; sacrificio a marte; sacrificio a Ercole.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Central tondo with vestal Tuccia; four small octagons with scene of sacrifice. Four tondi in corners showing Victory.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Design for Ceiling", ca. 1813.
ca. 1813. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1669.
